name: Kaskus Fixups
description:
This userstyle fixes some styling annoyances of the Kaskus Online Forum (www.kaskus.us)

The fixups are:
- (v0.1.0): Wider columns
- (v0.1.0): User-info column's width is now limited
- (v0.1.1): Scrollbar for extra-wide postings
- (v0.2.0): Now it works for Firefox 3
- (v0.2.1): Added new kaskus domain (kaskus.co.id)
- (v0.3.0): Now properly widens the new kaskus look
- (v0.3.1): Fixes whacked-out Posting box + recognizes kaskus by IP
- (v0.3.2): Also fixes EditPost box
- (v0.3.2ths): Fixes Forum tab click area <== Special Edition! (read below)

For official support, visit the following thread: http://www.kaskus.us/showthread.php?t=869507

Special Edition! note: Kaskus Fixups v0.3.2ths should be used with "The Handsome Set", a filterset subscription for AdBlock Plus (*not* AdBlock)

For more information about "The Handsome Set", visit:
http://pandu.poluan.info/blog/itguy-id.php/2008/05/17/menelusuri-web-dengan-lebih-cepat-bebas-
